body.name: ZENY 4-Tier Bookshelf, Ladder Bookcase, Multifunctional Ladder-Shaped Plant Flower Stand Rack Bookrack Storage Shelves (Rustic Brown)
features: Premium Quality Construction - The ZENY 4-Tier ladder shelf is made of solid iron frame & particleboard material, which is stable, durable, non-toxic, and with surface paint treatment, making the shelf looks more stylish and generous. And stability can also be guaranteed due to its ladder-like shape and flexible settings without any wobble can be come true. It is enough to meet your daily needs. It can serve you for a long time.

Practical & Multi-function Use - This 4-layer storage shelf with the 4-tier open shelving unit gives you ample area for placing toiletries, towels, sundries, shoes, books, plants, spice, or organizing books, office supplies, photo frames and other objects. This storage rack is suitable to be placed in the hall, living room, bed room, balcony,etc.

Space-saving Design - Elegant & meanwhile useful in storage. With large storage space it offers, this bookshelf can help a lot in keep your room clean and tidy. Hard surfaces for clocks, books, eyeglasses, plants, and etc.

Stable For Safe Use - The base of this is iron made and cross structure, which enhances the stability of the shelf so much. 4 protective caps on the bottom to ensure wooden ladder shelf stands stably while protecting your floor from scratches.

Easy to Assemble - The 4-Tier ladder shelf is need to be assembled by yourself. You can quickly assemble the item and use it in a clear and easy-to-understand manual. And with wet cloth you can wipe dirty stain easily from the surface.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZENY Industrial Ladder Shelf, 4-Tier Bookshelf, Storage Rack Shelves This ZENY ladder four-shelf bookcase combines vintage industrial style and functionality to create a modern home furnishing ideal for use in living room, kitchen, bedroom or any other space to display and store items, with walnut color, attractive and simple appearance, this bookcase will well match with your furniture in your home. Specifications: Color: Rustic Brown Material: Particleboard and Metal Frame Overall Dimension: 22.1" X 13.3" X 54.1" (LXWXH) Bottom Shelf: 20.9'' X12.6'' (LXW) The Second Middle Shelf: 20.9'' X11.5'' (LXW) The Third Middle Shelf: 20.9'' X10.4'' (LXW) Top Shelf: 20.9'' X10.4'' (LXW) Space between each shelf: 13.3" Load Capacity of Each Tier: 11 lb (5 kg) Weight: 15.15 lb (6.87 kg)

Features for ZENY 4 Tier Bookshelf Rack, Ladder Shelf Crafted by definitely precise craftsmanship, manufactured by top material, the panel is smooth and sturdy and the bracket is stable and reinforced. With crossbar design and selected material, X-bars at back for added stability, the shelf can be used for a long time and give you a perfect experience is displaying your items. Design with adjustable feet perfectly keep the unit balanced, and prevent floor from scratches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple yet beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I love this bookshelf. It is so simple yet beautiful. Very easy to put together and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute well made shelf, moderately frustrating assembly
reviews.reviewText: Package showed up damaged but the shelf was unscathed, the broken styrofoam left a huge mess though as you can see in the second pic. The legs are a PAIN to put together, I had to bang them on the floor to put them on. So expect the plastic to strip (and make sure to line up the screw holes before assembly, even without the screws these legs wont come apart) Although this comes with all the tools needed to put together, it would definitely save you a lot of time and sweat to use a drill instead. 16 screws on tight holes definitely takes some elbow grease. Over all though I LOVE this shelf, its super cute and definitely sturdy for its price :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Used for my home office. Sturdy and looks expensive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and easy to assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice design, slightly challenging assembly
reviews.reviewText: I love the look and sturdiness of these shelves. It’s better than I had expected. The assembly was a bit challenging for the metal frame. There is a bit of plastic that is meant to help with the sturdiness but the plastic was too thick so I need to shave down the plastic a bit for the pieces to fit. The assembly of the wooden shelves was a bit easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the easiest to assemble, but it's okay after the job is done
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a ladder bookshelf as it looks pretty nice when compared to a traditional (rectangular) bookshelf, and I found this one. There weren't too many pieces to put together however the first two parts (to put together the metal stand part) of the assembly wasn't easy. The metal to fit into the opening of the top and bottom of the legs was very tight. Would also recommend the manufacturer to highlight the difference between the "front" and "back" legs as I actually did it wrongly and ended up having to disassemble and reassemble again after the whole assembly was done. Otherwise after putting it up, it's fine for use, and I would say that it's better if the ladder shape is made more obvious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do Not Waste Your Cash!!
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for, however at $50.00 it’s trash. This item is a complete disaster! It stood better on three legs than completed with 4. I don’t understand the 4.5 out of 5 stars. Standards are low and this “bookshelf” is a clear example of companies paying pennies on the dollar to turn out crap.
